EZEMIDLALO NOKUZONWABISA: UBUME






UBUME

IINKONZO



USHICILELO



IZIXHOBO



UQHAGAMSHELWANO



KwezeMidlalo noLonwabo kujongwe ukuziswa kwemidlalo nezolonwabo eziya kuthi zingenelele endaweni yolwaphulo-mthetho kwiindawo zoluntu oluhlelelekileyo kwiNtshona Koloni.

Oku kwenziwa:

* ngokweenkqubo zezemidlalo nolonwabo
* izibonelelo nokuphuculwa kwamabala okudlala kwiNtshona Koloni
* inkxaso yezemali neyolawulo kwimibutho yezemidlalo nolonwabo
* uphuhliso lwabadlali abakwinqwanqwa eliphezulu, oko kusenziwa ngokweziko iWestern Cape Sports Academy
* ukukhuthazwa kwemicimbi yemidlalo nokhenketho ngemidlalo
* Umgaqo-nkqubo weMidlalo yeZikolo
* ukuphucula ubudlelwane phakathi kwezizwe zehlabathi ukuze kube nokuphuhliswa imidlalo nolonwabo eNtshona Koloni.
